name: Magic Chests for Minecraft PE
description:
From the creator of Skins Pro Creator for Minecraft, the original and most advanced skin creator on the App Store, comes a brand new app!

Magic Chests for Minecraft gives you the ability to choose any items you want to spawn in chests in your Minecraft world. Want diamonds in your spawn bonus chest? You got it! Magic Chests for Minecraft uses built in features of Minecraft to modify your own game worlds via add-on packs.

Features includes:
- Unlimited Magic Chest packs
- Hundreds of items to choose from
- Over 20 different chest types
- Easy exporting to Minecraft
- Easy organization with renaming and auto incrementing version numbers

Start out strong in your new survival world- start with Magic Chests!

Have suggestions or comments? Email us at apps@seejaykay.com and let us know what you think.
